title: Egypt - Tourist/Visit Visa

details.title: Eligibility
items: Valid Bangladeshi passport with at least 6 months validity from travel date
Minimum personal bank balance of 500,000 BDT per person
Basic travel purpose must be tourism or business only
Proof of financial means, hotel booking, and supporting job/business/student documents
Marriage certificate (notarized and translated) if spouse’s name is not in passport
NID and utility bill copies must be submitted
All current and previous passports must be submitted

details.title: Required Documents
items: Valid passport (minimum 6 months validity) and all previous passports
Two recent passport-size photos (white background, no cap or glasses)
Personal bank statement for last 6 months and solvency certificate (original with seal)
Marriage certificate (notarized and English translated, if applicable)
For Job Holders: NOC, office ID card, salary slip (last 3 months), GO (for govt.), BMDC/BAR/Retirement certificate as applicable
For Business Persons: Office pad, renewed trade license with notarized English copy, memorandum (for limited companies)
For Students: Photocopies of student ID (both sides), birth certificate

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
